messages.content: This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will reduce class sizes to under 30 for all 5, 6, and 7-year-olds making sure they get the best start.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put Police back on the street
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Tories cut funding for the Police, but Labour will fund 10,000 new Police Officers for the street.
Universal Credit hurts those that most need help. We will scrap it - helping 10,955 in Ealing Southall.
Our Green New Deal will modernize the whole economy, creating 850,000 good, new jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Keep the NHS for the public
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will deliver more nurses and doctors, cuts to waiting times and an end to privatisation.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: a Tory Government committed to leaving the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: I have a long record of opposing Brexit. I do not believe it is right for the country and I cannot abide by all us poorer. I believe in international cooperation, and I believe in working with our European neighbours.
issues.economy: Our Green New Deal will modernize the whole economy, creating 850,000 good, new jobs.
issues.education: We will reduce class sizes to under 30 for all 5, 6, and 7-year-olds making sure they get the best start.
issues.environment: This is the new lobby about climate change, but the most amazing was that the most people walk of all life and all ages. I spoke with scientists about our ambitious plans for decarbonising the economy and creating hundreds of thousands of new jobs for the future. We have to act on man-made climate change, or it will be too late for everyone around the world.
issues.health: We will deliver more nurses and doctors, cuts to waiting times and an end to privatisation.
issues.labourEmployment: Our Green New Deal will modernize the whole economy, creating 850,000 good, new jobs.
issues.lawCrime: The Tories cut funding for the Police, but Labour will fund 10,000 new Police Officers for the street.
issues.socialWelfare: Universal Credit hurts those that most need help. We will scrap it - helping 10,955 in Ealing Southall.

community.content: Just like so many of us I take great pride in our constituency, but sadly some people don't. That is why we will continue to fight against littering and flytipping. Vored you, we will introduce a sticter enforcement code for persistent offenders, add more new and shared policy CCTV images accross direct cause and hold clean up events with local groups so we can all take pride in where we live, because littering here greenspaces runs lives in our endence.

endorsements.endorsement: I am pleased to say our MP, Virendra Sharma has stood by us and EU citizen to the UK. Vote for Virendra to continue support the majority of voters in Ealing who see the benefits of our EU membership.

My father started this business in 1969 and since I was a Councillor Virendra has backed us and been a champion for local businesses in Parliament, standing up for hardworking families. Let's back him for Ealing Southall and back our businesses.

examples: We will reduce class sizes to under 30 for all 5, 6, and 7-year-olds making sure they get the best start.
The Tories cut funding for the Police, but Labour will fund 10,000 new Police Officers for the street.
This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.
This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.

I have a long record of opposing Brexit. I do not believe it is right for the country and I cannot abide by all us poorer. I believe in international cooperation, and I believe in working with our European neighbours.

Just like so many of us I take great pride in our constituency, but sadly some people don't. That is why we will continue to fight against littering and flytipping. Vored you, we will introduce a sticter enforcement code for persistent offenders, add more new and shared policy CCTV images accross direct cause and hold clean up events with local groups so we can all take pride in where we live, because littering here greenspaces runs lives in our endence.
